biography: Niyaz Ahmed is an Indian molecular epidemiologist, a senior professor of microbial sciences, genomicist, and a veterinarian by training, based in Hyderabad.
aiSummary: Niyaz Ahmed is a microbial genomics specialist with an H-index of 51 at University of Hyderabad (Member). Has been published in Nature Reviews Microbiology. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
